eyewear.description: The 1211 Pink Lady from Cutler and Gross is a Cat-eye done modern in all the right ways. A smooth upswept brow line and scooped bridge give this design its elegance and subtlety, but its vibrant color maintains the high standard that all Pink Ladies live by: a little bit of sass. Crafted from premium acetate with a hand-polished finish.

eyewear.name: ODLRS- 219
eyewear.description: Oscar de la Renta's "Petite Cat Eye" sunglasses are a little feline and a little retro, too. Handmade in Japan from premium acetate and polished gold metal, for the ever-so-slightly daring darling in all of us. Available in Pink Tortoise, Turquoise Tortoise, and classic Black.

Some people think that aviators are only for sunglasses. Well, news flash. Some people are dumb and also think that the Pacific Ocean isn't on a world map (true story 30% of Americans couldn't locate it!) These Stark aviator frames take the "computer nerd" look and bring it into the 21st century. Smart in more than ways than one, looks like Arthur from IT just went up on the hotness scale. *We would like to clarify there is no actual scientific hotness scale.

eyewear.name: RB 3136 Caravan
eyewear.description:
The squared off lenses make the Caravan a formidable competitor to the classic aviator. This universally flattered shape is hard to beat.

Metal allow wire frame with plastic stem tips for a comfortable fit. 100% UV prtection. Small white Ray-Ban signature on right lens. Adjustable nosepads for a personalized fit. Made in Itay.
